function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 due to unusual occupation of social assistance buildings and community centers during the pandemic.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission within the community due to higher occupancy of these social support buildings.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, limit occupancy, and promote vaccination efforts in these buildings.","Technologies":"Smart building management systems, air purification technologies, and contact tracing applications.","People":"Community members, particularly those who visit or work in the social assistance buildings and community centers.","Owner":"Local government authorities, building managers, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Increased energy consumption in municipal buildings due to the shift to work-from-home policies during the lockdown.","Impact":"Higher energy usage leading to increased operational costs and environmental impact.","Mitigation":"Implement energy efficiency measures, promote remote work best practices, and monitor energy usage in municipal buildings.","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, remote work collaboration tools, and smart energy monitoring systems.","People":"Employees working from home, municipal building occupants, and environmental advocates.","Owner":"Municipal government, building administrators, and environmental management organizations."}]}
